Grace Battista wrote:

>>Now I''m really wishing I hadn't done the Ayunee has a mad crush on 
>>Saitou fic, Hijikata would have worked out so much better....
>>    
>>
>
>- I dare to disagree with you. I just finished reading your fic (the 
>first PMK fic I ever read and it was wonderful)>>
>
Thank you *blush* It was pretty good considering I wrote it only a few 
episodes in to the series.

> and I think Saitou 
>was a better choice than Hijikata. First I don't think the PMK 
>Hijikata would really do/say what Saitou did in your story.>>
>
See that's the beauty of the H/A pairing (which I wish I would have 
considered sooner)---we know that Hijikata had a hidden "soft side" and 
that's the thing that would ultimately make him behave very much like my 
version of Saitou did.

> Second 
>because if you used Hijikata, we will not hear of Ayunee's mother 
>which I think was a good inclusion. >>
>
Considering Saitou's abilities in the 6th sense area and knowing how 
mothers are it seemed natural

>Third because wasn't Hijikata in 
>real life a playboy?>>
>
Once again that's why it would be so cool to use Hijikata. No one would 
expect it and yet after seeing the whole series it now makes perfect 
sense. with the same or similar  plot

> Fourth (and this might not be important), I LOVE 
>ALL INCARNATIONS OF SAITOU-SAMA.>>
>
As we all do!!! I have a serious thing going for the live action 
versions lately. *grin*

--
